1.12.2.1.1.0:
Tweaked the layout of the book.
Added Statistics section to the book.
Added mouse scroll page turning to the book.
Fixed resident Blessed levels.
1.12.2.1.2.0:
Can now open the book by right-clicking a Bed or Item Frame.
Underlined the Resident or Structure name that was right-clicked on.
Added Current Position and Structure to Resident pages.
Added floor tile count to Structure Types and Homes.
1.12.2.1.3.0:
New villager images, include female Cleric and Teacher.
Fixed the level display of Captains when blessed.
Fixed duplicate villager entries after converting the villager.
1.12.2.1.3.1: Fixed the crash opening the book, when running on dedicated server.
1.12.2.1.4.0: Added Total Armor Value, Armor Items and Equipment Items to resident pages.
1.12.2.1.5.0: Cleaned up the book's display. Added new maps at the end of the book. Added more information into the book.
1.12.2.1.6.0:
Fixed the Resident Count on specific pages.
Added Overcrowding to Structures and Statistics pages.
